The 'Casual' tag on SteamDB lists games that are typically more relaxed and accessible to a wide range of players. These games often prioritize ease of use, simplicity, and minimal learning curve over complex mechanics or intense gameplay. They may include puzzle games, hidden object games, time management simulations, and other types of software that can be enjoyed by players looking for a more laid-back experience. The Casual tag is perfect for gamers who want to unwind, relax, and enjoy a game without the pressure of competing at a high level or mastering intricate mechanics. These games are designed to be approachable for players of all ages and skill levels, making them an excellent choice for anyone looking to explore the world of video games in a more leisurely way.
